
```{r }

stocks_ipo = stocks_ipo %>% 
  inner_join(clean_market_df %>% 
               select(id) %>% 
               distinct(), by = c("tase_id" = "id"))

clean_market_df %>% 
  select(id) %>% 
  inner_join(stocks_ipo %>% 
               select(id = tase_id) %>% 
               distinct(), by = "id") %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  nrow()
```
